definitions.definition: a number of similar or related events or things, one following another:
examples: There has been a series of sexual attacks on women in the area.

definitions.definition: a number of games played one after another by two teams against each other:
examples: The Yankees have a four-game series against the Orioles at home.

definitions.definition: Parts of an electrical system that are in series are arranged in a single line so that the current flows through each part, one after another.
